categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Navrata was a Human male ensign in the Imperial Army who served during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. Following the Empire's defeat at the Battle of Corellia, Navrata was among the Imperial forces that remained on the planet Corellia to secure the Black Hole refinery region, and was stationed at Horizon Outpost as an aide to General Adele Konya.
Ensign Navrata appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a NPC in the Black Hole Daily Area, which was added in Game Update 1.2: Legacy on April 12, 2012.
